name: j045_databases
description: ## Intro to Databases - What is a database?     - Collection of info/data     - has an interface (write code to interact with it) - SQL(relational) vs NoSQL(non-relational)     - Below is an example of a relational database:     - out of laziness I'm using http://www.tablesgenerator.com/markdown_tables to generate tables     - Everything is tabular so you have to define a table beforehand and not very flexible         - adding new columns and etc     - non- relational you don't have to define patterns ahead of time - Users Table:
